```{r include = FALSE, purl = F, cache = F}
library(knitr)

## set knitr options
opts_chunk$set(cache = FALSE, tidy.opts = list(width.cutoff = 55), tidy = F, fig.align = "center", fig.width = 5, fig.height = 5, multCode = F)

## variables to help save latex answers for appendix
taskCtr <- 0
solLabels <- list()

## custom engine for tasks
knit_engines$set(task = function(options) {
    ## increment counter
    assign("taskCtr", taskCtr + 1, pos = 1)
    solLabels[[taskCtr]] <- c(taskCtr, NA)
    assign("solLabels", solLabels, pos = 1)
    ## knit child
    out <- gsub("``", "```", options$code)
    out <- knit_child(text = out)
    ## set up output
    if(opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") != "latex") {
        out <- paste("<div class=\"panel panel-default\"><div class=\"panel-heading\"> Task </div><div class=\"panel-body\">", out, "</div></div>")
    } else {
        out <- paste0("\\hypertarget{tsk", taskCtr, "}{}\\bblockT{\\phantomsection\\label{sol", taskCtr, "}", taskCtr, "}\n", out, "\n\\eblockT\n")
    }
    out
})

## custom engine for solutions
knit_engines$set(solution = function(options) {
    if(!options$multCode) {
        out <- gsub("``", "```", options$code)
        out <- knit_child(text = out)
        if(opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") != "latex") {
            out <- paste0("<button id=\"displayText", options$label, "\" onclick=\"javascript:toggle('", options$label, "');\">Show Solution</button>\n\n<div id=\"toggleText", options$label, "\" style=\"display: none\"><div class=\"panel panel-default\"><div class=\"panel-heading panel-heading1\"> Solution </div><div class=\"panel-body\">", out, "</div></div></div>\n")
        } else {
            solLabels[[taskCtr]][2] <- out
            assign("solLabels", solLabels, pos = 1)
            out <- paste0("\\hyperlink{sol", taskCtr, "}{\\buttonS{Show Solution on P\\colpageref{tsk", taskCtr, "}}}")
        }
        return(out)
    } else {
        ## split code
        code <- grep("####", options$code)
        if(length(code) != 1){
            stop(paste("Can't split chunk", options$label, "into two equal parts"))
        }
        code <- list(options$code[1:(code - 1)], options$code[(code + 1):length(options$code)])
        out <- lapply(code, function(x){
            gsub("``", "```", x)
        })
        tempTidy <- options$tidy
        tempTidyOpts <- options$tidy.opts
        out <- lapply(out, function(x) {
            if(opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") != "latex") {
                return(knit_child(text = x))
            } else {
                opts_chunk$set(tidy = T, tidy.opts = list(width.cutoff = 20))
                x <- knit_child(text = x)
                return(x)
            }
        })
        opts_chunk$set(tidy = tempTidy, tidy.opts = tempTidyOpts)
        if(opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") != "latex") {
            out <- paste0("<div class=\"tab\"><button class=\"tablinks", options$label, " active\" onclick=\"javascript:openCode(event, 'baseR", options$label, "', '", options$label, "');\">Base R</button><button class=\"tablinks", options$label, "\" onclick=\"javascript:openCode(event, 'tidyverse", options$label, "', '", options$label, "');\"><tt>tidyverse</tt></button></div><div id=\"baseR", options$label, "\" class=\"tabcontent", options$label, "\">", out[[1]], "</div><div id=\"tidyverse", options$label, "\" class=\"tabcontent", options$label, "\">", out[[2]], "</div><script> javascript:hide('tidyverse", options$label, "') </script>")
            out <- paste0("<button id=\"displayText", options$label, "\" onclick=\"javascript:toggle('", options$label, "');\">Show Solution</button>\n\n<div id=\"toggleText", options$label, "\" style=\"display: none\"><div class=\"panel panel-default\"><div class=\"panel-heading panel-heading1\"> Solution </div><div class=\"panel-body\">", out, "</div></div></div>\n")
            return(out)
        } else {
            out <- paste0("\\bmp\n\\bblockST{Base R}\n", out[[1]], "\n\\eblockST\n\\emp\n\\hspace{0.01\\textwidth}\n\\bmp\\bblockST{\\texttt{tidyverse}}\n", out[[2]], "\n\\eblockST\n\\emp\n")
            solLabels[[taskCtr]][2] <- out
            assign("solLabels", solLabels, pos = 1)
            out <- paste0("\\hyperlink{sol", taskCtr, "}{\\buttonS{Show Solution on P\\colpageref{tsk", taskCtr, "}}}")
        }
        return(out)
    }
})

## custom engine for tabbed box

    if(length(code) != 1){
        stop(paste("Can't split chunk", options$label, "into two equal parts"))

        gsub("``", "```", x)
    })

    tempTidyOpts <- options$tidy.opts
    out <- lapply(out, function(x) {
        if(opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") != "latex") {
            return(knit_child(text = x))

    } else {
        out <- paste0("\\bmp\n\\bblockST{Base R}\n", out[[1]], "\n\\eblockST\n\\emp\n\\hspace{0.01\\textwidth}\n\\bmp\\bblockST{\\texttt{tidyverse}}\n", out[[2]], "\n\\eblockST\n\\emp\n")
    }
    return(out)
})
